card.cardText: ACEï¼šYou can let anyone drink. This card can only use once.
BAR GIRL: You need to drink with anyone who are going to drink until the next Bar girl appear.
SORTER: You need to name a category. Everyone from your right-hand side needs to name one thing from this catergory. The one fails to name/give the duplicate names drinks.
CAMERA: Whenever you say 'CAMERA', everyone must stop moving. The one moves first drinks.
REPEATER: Whenever you say 'REPEATER', everyone must repeat what they say, did, drink... The first one gives up drinks.
MATH CARD: You start with a random number. Everyone from you right-hand side follows you to count. Clap when it's 7,17,27,37...107...
TOILET CARD: You have the right to go to restroom. Or you can trade it to other with any conditions you like.
NOSE TOUCHER: You can touch your nose at any time. The last one follows you to touch nose drinks.
FREAK CARD: No one is allowed to talk to you. If someone accidentally talks to you, S/he drinks.
The one on your left drinks.
The one on your right drinks.
King: The first king decides how many glasses the rest of the kings need to drink.
You can use it to offset any penalties for once.
